A Bahia est√° prestes a produzir vidro solar gra√ßas √† parceria entre a Companhia Baiana de Pesquisa Mineral (CBPM) e a empresa Homerun Brasil Minera√ß√£o, subsidi√°ria da mineradora canadense Homerun Resources. Intitulado ‚ÄúBrasil Transparente‚Äù, o projeto teve in√≠cio em junho de 2023, quando a CBPM, sob a gest√£o de Henrique Carballal, decidiu aprimorar o aproveitamento da areia silicosa presente nas √°reas da companhia localizadas no munic√≠pio de Belmonte, na regi√£o sul da Bahia. ‚ÄúA CBPM passou a enxergar esse recurso com um novo olhar estrat√©gico, buscando parcerias para direcion√°-lo a um segmento de maior valor agregado e impacto global: a produ√ß√£o de vidro para pain√©is solares, um novo direcionamento que refor√ßa o papel da Bahia como protagonista no setor de energia renov√°vel e no desenvolvimento sustent√°vel do Pa√≠s‚Äù, explica Carballal. ‚ÄúA CBPM entende que a instala√ß√£o de uma ind√∫stria para processar essa s√≠lica, transformando-a em vidro solar, entre outros elementos industriais utilizados para a fabrica√ß√£o de tecnologias de energia renov√°vel, √© mais do que fundamental nesse momento em que o planeta clama pela transi√ß√£o energ√©tica.‚Äù

O projeto ganhou novo avan√ßo nesta semana, quando a CBPM anunciou que a unidade de beneficiamento da areia silicosa, or√ßada em R$ 100 milh√µes e antes prevista para ser instalada no munic√≠pio de Ilh√©us, agora ser√° implantada em Belmonte. Para acelerar o empreendimento, o prefeito de Belmonte ofereceu um terreno no munic√≠pio para viabilizar, al√©m da implanta√ß√£o da unidade de beneficiamento, a instala√ß√£o da f√°brica de vidro solar. No entanto, ainda n√£o h√° uma defini√ß√£o acerca do munic√≠pio para implanta√ß√£o da f√°brica de vidro solar, originalmente prevista para Cama√ßari ‚Äî local estrategicamente escolhido por sua infraestrutura e voca√ß√£o industrial. A decis√£o est√° a cargo da Secretaria de Desenvolvimento Econ√¥mico (SDE), respons√°vel pela gest√£o do Polo Industrial do munic√≠pio.
Agora, a CBPM informa buscar apoio da secretaria e da Prefeitura de Cama√ßari para tornar poss√≠vel o projeto que representa uma oportunidade de desenvolvimento socioecon√¥mico e independ√™ncia energ√©tica para o estado da Bahia. ‚ÄúN√≥s apresentamos o projeto √† SDE e nos reunimos com o prefeito Luiz Caetano‚Äù, informa Carballal. ‚ÄúEstamos aguardando a decis√£o, confiantes de que iremos encontrar no Polo de Cama√ßari o terreno ideal para a instala√ß√£o da f√°brica.‚Äù
A planta de beneficiamento, prevista para ser constru√≠da em Belmonte, deve gerar cerca de 180 empregos diretos. O prefeito avalia que o projeto vai mudar a realidade social da cidade. ‚ÄúA maior empregadora √© a prefeitura e a abertura de 180 vagas muda a realidade de Belmonte‚Äù, avalia. ‚ÄúCom esse projeto, a CBPM vai nos ajudar a qualificar nossa m√£o de obra e ter essa integra√ß√£o comunidade e empresa.‚Äù
Para a deputada Fab√≠ola Mansur, com a chegada do empreendimento, Belmonte entra, definitivamente, no mapa da minera√ß√£o da Bahia. ‚ÄúEssa √© uma oportunidade de gerar riquezas e novos neg√≥cios para o munic√≠pio, que agora se torna sede da primeira unidade de beneficiamento da areia silicosa na Am√©rica Latina‚Äù, destaca. ‚ÄúAl√©m do impacto econ√¥mico, o projeto refor√ßa nosso compromisso com a responsabilidade social e a sustentabilidade.‚Äù
Pr√≥ximos passos
Questionado sobre o que se pode esperar nos pr√≥ximos tempos em rela√ß√£o ao empreendimento, o diretor de opera√ß√µes da Homerun informa que o projeto avan√ßa conforme o planejado. ‚ÄúAs licen√ßas ambientais e de opera√ß√£o para a extra√ß√£o mineral j√° foram obtidas, a portaria de lavra est√° em fase final de emiss√£o e a engenharia das unidades industriais de beneficiamento de areia e produ√ß√£o de vidro est√° em andamento‚Äù, lista Farhate. ‚ÄúLogo ap√≥s o governo do estado finalizar a doa√ß√£o do im√≥vel no polo de Cama√ßari, daremos in√≠cio √† engenharia civil e terraplanagem, com previs√£o de implementa√ß√£o entre 2025 e 2028, condicionado ao cronograma de acordo ao tempo que receber o im√≥vel.‚Äù
Projeto impulsiona gera√ß√£o de empregos e desenvolvimento social
A expectativa √© que o projeto fruto da parceria entre a CBPM e a Homerun gere at√© 700 empregos diretos e outros 2,8 mil indiretos, al√©m de mil postos tempor√°rios. De acordo com o diretor de opera√ß√µes da mineradora, Armando Farhate, a valoriza√ß√£o da m√£o de obra local √© uma das diretrizes do empreendimento. ‚ÄúCriamos um plano de a√ß√£o para priorizar os trabalhadores da regi√£o, pensando na gera√ß√£o de emprego, renda e na promo√ß√£o do desenvolvimento social e econ√¥mico das comunidades envolvidas‚Äù, ressalta.
De acordo com ele, o Projeto Brasil Transparente segue diretrizes alinhadas com os princ√≠pios da Governan√ßa Socioecon√¥mica e Ambiental (ESG), com foco em sustentabilidade e impacto positivo para as comunidades. A empresa est√° em fase de conclus√£o de uma parceria com um centro de pesquisa nacional para desenvolver t√©cnicas inovadoras na minera√ß√£o da areia silicosa, incluindo solu√ß√µes para manejo de rejeitos e redu√ß√£o de impactos ambientais.
Tamb√©m foi firmado um acordo entre a Homerun e a CBPM para a cria√ß√£o de um fundo destinado ao desenvolvimento educacional nos munic√≠pios impactados pelo projeto. ‚ÄúEssa iniciativa refor√ßa nosso compromisso com o desenvolvimento sustent√°vel e com a melhoria da qualidade de vida das comunidades locais‚Äù, afirma Farhate.
Qualifica√ß√£o
Ap√≥s confirmar a implanta√ß√£o da primeira fase do processamento da areia silicosa em Belmonte, a CBPM informa ter firmado conv√™nio para capacita√ß√£o de m√£o de obra local. Segundo Carballal, a iniciativa atende recomenda√ß√£o do governador Jer√¥nimo Rodrigues (PT). ‚ÄúSeguindo a determina√ß√£o do governador, a CBPM assumiu o compromisso de estabelecer um conv√™nio com a prefeitura para realizar a qualifica√ß√£o de m√£o de obra dos mun√≠cipes de Belmonte, para que eles estejam qualificados para trabalhar no processo industrial da empresa canadense, e a CBPM est√° assumindo um compromisso de dar estrutura para a prefeitura qualificar esses trabalhadores.‚Äù
Carballal tamb√©m destaca a import√¢ncia de uma a√ß√£o c√©lere para que a Bahia esteja apta a atender √†s demandas decorrentes das mudan√ßas clim√°ticas. ‚ÄúA transi√ß√£o energ√©tica est√° ocorrendo no mundo e a Bahia tem que estar preparada, Belmonte tem que estar preparada para que o povo possa aproveitar a riqueza que vai ser gerada desse processo‚Äù, avalia.
Para o diretor de opera√ß√µes da mineradora, a atua√ß√£o conjunta com a CBPM tem sido fundamental para transformar o projeto em realidade, garantindo que a Bahia se posicione estrategicamente no setor de energia renov√°vel.
‚ÄúAl√©m de conceder os direitos miner√°rios da jazida √† Homerun em condi√ß√µes justas de mercado, a CBPM atuou ativamente na estrutura√ß√£o do projeto, na atra√ß√£o de investimentos e na articula√ß√£o com diferentes √≥rg√£os p√∫blicos para garantir sua viabilidade‚Äù, sublinha Farhate. title: Brazil Pip Super Falcons In 2024 Olympics Opener
text: Super Falcons of Nigeria, lost their 2024 Olympics opener against Brazil by 1-0 at the Bordeaux Stadium, in France on Thursday. A 37th-minute goal from Gabi Nunes was all that was needed for the South American giant to deny Nigeria‚Äôs three points in their first game at this year‚Äôs Olympics. Randy Waldrum, Nigeria‚Äôs head coach, opted to leave Asisat Oshoala on the bench and instead named Chinwendu Ihezuo as the team‚Äôs centre forward. READ MORE: Paris Olympics: Oshoala, Ajibade, Nnadozie Make Falcons Squad Rashidat Ajibade made several attempts to drive the team‚Äôs attack, including setting up Ihezuo with a well-placed cross and forcing Brazil‚Äôs goalkeeper Lorena into a save. Christy Ucheibe also tested Lorena, but Nigeria‚Äôs efforts were not enough. Brazil‚Äôs Marta, a six-time Women‚Äôs World Footballer of the Year, initially thought she had scored in the 36th minute, but the goal was disallowed for offside after a VAR review. Shortly afterward, a lapse in concentration allowed Nunes to capitalize on a chance, driving the ball past Nigeria‚Äôs goalkeeper Chiamaka Nnadozie and into the net. This means that Brazil have defeated the Super Falcons three times in their last four meetings and it means that Nigeria must beat the reigning world champions, Spain, on July 28 at Stade de la Beaujoire in Nantes to stand a chance of qualifying from Group C.

author: David Badash, The New Civil Rights Movement
title: Musk and Ramaswamy heading new ‚ÄòDOGE‚Äô prompts legal and ethical concerns: experts
text: President-elect Donald [Trump](https://www.rawstory.com/trump-news/) [announced](https://x.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1856658569124262092) Tuesday evening that he will create the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE), and named billionaire tech mogul Elon Musk and biotech and financial entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy as its co-directors. Experts are raising legal and ethical concerns across various issues. One ethics expert says both Musk and Ramaswamy will have to divest from their extensive financial assets to avoid a federal conflict of interest law. Professor of Law Richard Painter, who served as the chief [White House](https://www.rawstory.com/tag/white-house) ethics lawyer under Republican President George W. Bush, issued a warning just hours after Trump's announcement. "This is a federal office subject to the financial conflict of interest statute, 18 U.S.C. Section 208. They will both have to divest conflicting financial interests or risk violating a criminal statute," Painter [wrote](https://x.com/RWPUSA/status/1856508174674624808). READ MORE: [Trump Victory Was ‚ÄòSlim‚Äô and Not the ‚ÄòHistoric Mandate‚Äô Republicans Claim, Analysis Shows](https://www.thenewcivilrightsmovement.com/2024/11/trump-victory-was-slim-and-not-the-historic-mandate-republicans-claim-analysis-shows/) He [offered](https://x.com/RWPUSA/status/1856509030098780448) some examples: "Elon Musk must divest X or recuse from government matters affecting social media platforms; he must divest Tesla or recuse from government matters affecting the auto industry, electric batteries, etc." Attorney Tristan Snell, the former New York prosecutor who helped secure a $25 million settlement against Trump University, [agreed](https://x.com/TristanSnell/status/1856537654084440193): "Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy will have to divest their business holdings if they want to join the Trump administration, to avoid violating conflict-of-interest laws. So if Elon takes a job, could he be forced to sell his stock in Tesla? Or could he be forced to sell Twitter?" Professor Painter also pointed to a [CNN](https://www.rawstory.com/tag/cnn) report highlighting potential conflicts. "The announcement of Ramaswamy and particularly Musk, who leads companies with existing, lucrative government contracts, raises immediate questions about potential conflicts of interest," [CNN](https://www.cnn.com/2024/11/12/politics/elon-musk-vivek-ramaswamy-department-of-government-efficiency-trump) reported. "It is not immediately clear how the department ‚Äì which Trump said would 'provide advice and guidance from outside of Government' ‚Äì would operate, and whether a Congress even [fully controlled by Republicans](https://www.cnn.com/2024/11/07/politics/gop-agenda-trump-congress/index.html) would have the appetite to approve such a massive overhaul of government spending and operations." CNN also noted that last year Ramaswamy, "who had promised on the campaign trail to eliminate the FBI, the Department of Education and the Nuclear Regulatory Commission, which would lay off thousands of federal workers in the process ‚Äì released a white paper outlining a legal framework he said would allow the president to eliminate federal agencies of his choice." [The Daily Beast](https://www.thedailybeast.com/trump-puts-first-buddy-elon-musk-in-charge-of-fake-govt-department/) suggested there could be ways to circumvent the requirements of federal law. "Trump could ... appoint the duo under the [Federal Advisory Committees Act](https://www.gsa.gov/policy-regulations/policy/federal-advisory-committee-management/legislation-and-regulations/federal-advisory-committee-act), which allows the government to set up groups to provide 'expert advice, ideas, and diverse opinions to the Federal Government.'" "This would potentially allow Musk and Ramaswamy to remain advisers instead of federal employees‚Äîmeaning they would not necessarily be legally required to disclose conflicts of interest like employees of agencies such as the [Department of Justice](https://www.justice.gov/jmd/ethics/summary-government-ethics-rules-new-department-officials) or the [Defense Department](https://dodsoco.ogc.osd.mil/DoD-Personnel/Ethics-Topics-for-DoD-Personnel/Conflict-of-Interest/)." Other critics are raising additional concerns. READ MORE: [‚ÄòNo Excuse‚Äô: Dems Have Just Weeks to Get Dozens of Biden‚Äôs Judicial Nominees Confirmed](https://www.thenewcivilrightsmovement.com/2024/11/no-excuse-dems-have-just-weeks-to-get-dozens-of-bidens-judicial-nominees-confirmed/) Some have suggested that in general, only Congress, not the President, can create new federal agencies. The Daily Beast reports, "government agencies can only be created by an act of Congress." It appears Trump's new agency, based on his announcement, may operate out of the Office of Management and Budget (OMB). It is unclear how funding would work. And while DOGE would suggest where to cut or eliminate funding, generally only Congress can determine how and how much federal funds are spent. It is generally [unlawful for the President to decide](https://democrats-budget.house.gov/resources/reports/impoundment-control-act-1974-what-it-why-does-it-matter) to not spend funds Congress allocates. Others are mocking the choice of the new agency's name. Attorney and creator of the SHERO political and legal newsletter, Amee Vanderpool, [points out](https://x.com/girlsreallyrule/status/1856685074739089458) that DOGE is "an acronym that is frat boy shout out to cryptocurrency," and notes that "an official agency cannot be created without Congress." NOTUS political investigations reporter Jose Pagliery [adds](https://x.com/Jose_Pagliery/status/1856523462224887889), "Wait, the Elon/Vivek department will be called DOGE? They're memefying the government. The actual government." Those concerns are accurate, as [CNBC](https://www.cnbc.com/2024/11/13/dogecoin-surges-20percent-after-trump-announces-a-department-of-government-efficiency-doge.html) explains: Dogecoin "shot higher on Tuesday night, extending its postelection surge after President-elect Donald Trump formally announced the [creation of the Department of Government Efficiency](https://www.cnbc.com/2024/11/12/trump-says-musk-and-ramaswamy-will-lead-government-efficiency-group.html), which he referred to as 'DOGE' in his statement. The Daily Beast added that "DOGE" is "a reference to a decade-old meme that was later turned into a [cryptocurrency](https://www.thedailybeast.com/dogecoin-investors-accuse-elon-musk-of-insider-trading-in-lawsuit/) beloved by Musk." Musk himself appears to have come up with the idea of a Department of Government Efficiency, in August: I am willing to serve[pic.twitter.com/BJhGbcA2e0] ‚Äî Elon Musk (@elonmusk)[August 20, 2024] And reinforced it again in September: Department of Government Efficiency[pic.twitter.com/HFeHYNIkJN] ‚Äî Elon Musk (@elonmusk)[September 7, 2024] He appears to already be thinking about marketing ideas: Department of Government Efficiency The merch will be üî•üî•üî• ‚Äî Elon Musk (@elonmusk)[November 13, 2024] Musk also [highlighted](https://x.com/elonmusk/status/1856520760656797801) what he says he sees as "a leaderboard for most insanely dumb spending of your tax dollars. title: A Prayer When it Feels Like You're Always in Conflict - Your Daily Prayer - June 1 - Devotional
text: A Prayer When it Feels Like You're Always in Conflict - Your Daily Prayer - June 1 A Prayer When it Feels Like You're Always in Conflict By Amanda Idleman ‚ÄúAnd the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.‚Äù - Phillippians 4:7 Conflict steals our peace. It‚Äôs impossible to feel at ease in your environment when tension is thick in the air. We need resolution, reconciliation, justice, and redemption in order to find contentment. Some things we don‚Äôt have the power to change. We can‚Äôt make a loved one change their behavior, we can‚Äôt undo certain broken systems on our own, we can‚Äôt force our child to forgive us, and the list goes on. We live in a broken world, which means some tensions never dissipate. Other seasons seem to be filled with bitter disagreement. My husband and I went through some very tough and long years in which the majority of our interactions led to anger, confusion, disappointment, and hurt feelings. The pain, sadness, shame, and helplessness we each individually felt through those years when it came to our relationship nearly broke us. God‚Äôs promise that he is the great healer gave us the hope we needed to keep coming back to each other even though we felt overwhelmed by our needs. It‚Äôs likely that all of us will face moments where conflict seems to consume us, but the good news is that when we are stuck in a place of brokenness, we have a helper who is the Holy Spirit, and we can call on him ( John 14:26 )! He is a powerful advocate who offers comfort in every circumstance. We may not be able to change our circumstances, but he can. He can give us new eyes that help us find peace, wisdom that helps us determine what healthy boundaries we need to put in place to guard our hearts, and he can help bring broken things back to life! After struggling for several years in our marriage , the only thing that changed, which led to healing, was a desperate cry of surrender to the Holy Spirit. We needed his eyes, his wisdom, peace, healing power, and guidance to help us find freedom from the cycle of brokenness that was destroying our family. The astounding thing is that he was faithful to answer our prayers. The change we needed didn‚Äôt happen overnight. It included the help of amazing counselors, deep efforts to change our habits, to see each other differently, and supernatural forgiveness to restore our love for each other. We had to partner with God‚Äôs process to find healing, and graciously, through that holy partnership, we experienced a miracle. This is what we need when we are stuck‚Ä¶ a miracle! May you find the strength to go to the Lord once again and seek his will for your life. Let him do what only he can do. By his grace we are set free ( Galatians 5:1 ). May his peace that transcends our ability to comprehend be upon your home, your work, your future, your relationships, and your life. Would he do abundantly above and beyond all you could ask, think, or imagine ( Ephesians 3:20 ). Let‚Äôs pray: Father, we come to you feeling desperate, hopeless, and alone. We need your wisdom in order to find a way back to your peace in a situation that seems to be an endless well of conflict. Show us your ways, teach us your path, and guide us in your truth. I thank you that you are a God that knows our hearts. You are a God who values justice and truth. You also are full of patience and grace. May your Spirit, who searches our hearts, intervene on my behalf. Let hidden things come to light. Let humility and service bring repentance where needed. May your wisdom show me what healthy boundaries look like in this situation. Would your healing touch soften and change my heart? Give me the strength to step back and trust you, especially when I have no control over the outcome of this situation. Do what only you can do, Jesus! I love you. Amen.
